title: The Kids Have Changed - Novel Updates
tags: Abusive Characters   Age Progression   Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Calm Protagonist   Child Abuse   Childcare   Childhood Friends   Childhood Love   Cute Children   Dense Protagonist   Enemies Become Allies   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Friendship   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Nobles   Royalty   Transmigration   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Lina   란아   린아 (潾娥)
description:
Nara Lee, an ambitious and diligent 35 year old, has finally achieved her dream: buying a rooftop apartment! Little did she know she wouldn’t have time to enjoy it, as she ends up reincarnated as the 8-year-old Sharon Atrina, a side character in her favorite webnovel, “The Queen’s Extravagant Outing.” As Sharon, a wealthy and beautiful noblewoman, she has everything she could possibly want, but she’s destined to die a pitiful death at the age of 20 after being betrayed by her best friend, Carol — the villainess!

Rather than waiting for death, she takes it upon herself to raise Carol — whose terrible personality resulted from bad parenting — into a better person, and save both of their lives to change their future!>
